ValidationRule.description: Ensures Skill, Role and Project are not Blank if Rate Type = Skill-based Override
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(amc__Rate_Type__c, "Skill-based Override"), OR( ISBLANK(amc__Project__c), ISBLANK(amc__Skill__c), ISBLANK(amc__Role__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Rate_Card_Entry__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Skill, Project and Role must contain a value, Rate Card Entry must be empty
